entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 18 February 2023
